name: Worthy Origin
desc: An app created with React.js that allows the user to track their carbon footprint for the foods they frequently buy. This app uses external APIs as well as a Mongo database.

name: Lyric Cloud
desc: When the user searches for a song, this app creates a word cloud based off the song lyrics. This app utilizes react-word-cloud and an external lyrics API.

name: React Staff Directory
desc: This app allows the user to view and search for different contacts in their directory.

name: Fitness Tracker
desc: Keeping track of one's workouts is made easier with this fitness tracker! This allows the user to create a workout and update the workout in progress as well as view charts about their progress.

name: Pantheos
desc: An app created to allow teachers to easily keep track of their students. This app was created using mySQL and handlebars.
